Articles.Content:
Good day peoples,

is it possible to control your Kerbal while they are floating in space? I pressed a lot of buttons but the poor little guy is floating further away from the Command Module, first loss of crew (in space) if I can't control him haha!

Hit R first, and that turns his little rocket pack on. Then you can jet him around using WASD and two other keys I can't remember because I remapped them, but they're listed under "settings" and "input" from the main menu.

Shift to rise, Control to descend Vanamonde

Also, L for their little lights
Thanks guys, though as soon as i posted my internet crashed.. the guy died, but atleast it won't happen again, by accident hehehehe
